Controller

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • Controller.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Server
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ServerInterface
    Receives message objects from send clients and sends the message object to all registered listen clients z Here the server object is the remote object itself (UnicastRemoteObject) Usage: java -cp bin Server vanuit project directory RMIChat
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
